TreatmentInformation.treatmentDescription: Please be advised SemanticBits office will be closed on Monday July 04, 2011 in observance of Independence Day. Time should be tracked accordingly in TimeIQ. If you should have any questions, please contact Christy Ventura. Have a safe and Happy Holiday.
